resources.string: PerMissions
The Calendar permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
The Camera permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
The Contacts permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
The Location permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
The Microphone permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
The Phone permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
The Sensors permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
The SMS permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
The Storage permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
A permission is required for this action. Denying will result in the action not running
This action requires the Calendar permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires the Camera permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires the Contacts permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires the Location permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires the Microphone permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires the Phone permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires the Sensors permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires the SMS permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires the Storage permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
This action requires a permission. Please enable in Settings > Apps
